venue.name: A.M.C. Highland Center at Crawford Notch

item.description:
9 AM start

We are planning a day hike on the Webster Cliff trail to Webster, then on to Jackson, then Pierce, and if the weather is really nice we may extend to Eisenhower and descend via Edmunds path.

We will meet at the Highland Center, then leave for the trailhead at 9 AM sharp begin our hike. The hike is 10.4 miles in length if we only go to Pierce - 12.1 if we include Eisenhower.

The Webster Cliff trail is rocky, steep, and has open ledges.

Our goal will be to maintain booktime which would put us on the summit of Pierce in under 6 hours.

Anybody considering this hike should be confident in their abilities and endurance, understand the principles in HikeSafe. (http://www.hikesafe.c...)

All attendees are responsible for reading, understanding and agreeing to the hikers responsibility code and waiver which can be found on this site.

Please contact us driectly with questions.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be having breakfast inside starting at 8:15
item.name: Webster-Jackson-Pierce - maybe Eisenhower
